attributes.action: drivers under the age of 25  should have to pass an annual re-test
attributes.additional_details:
Young drivers, before they  have amassed experience   in different weather conditions,  and before they have experienced  the  daft things other road users  do  when it is least expected,   should be compelled to take  a re-test  of the driving test annually.

Hopefully  this would  reduce the number of  casualties.
